judges: Before Jones, C. J. Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Mwion E. MacIntyre, Deputy District Attorney, and LeRoy S. Zimmerman, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Sharp, Appellant.
Submitted May 22, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J. Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
William II. Saye, for appellant.
Mwion E. MacIntyre, Deputy District Attorney, and LeRoy S. Zimmerman, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 28, 1972:
